Basic Settings Create Automatically Provide a Bridge I know Auto Manual address:port Single Line Bridge Settings Bridges are unlisted Tor relays that make it more difficult to block connections into the Tor network. Because of how some countries try to block Tor, certain bridges work in some countries but not others Select Default Bridge Request Bridge
Welcome | Hidden Web Gateway This application provide you a platform to Search and Open Hidden Web urls.Here are few Suggestions\n Deep Web Online Market Leaked Documents and Books Dark Web News and Articles Secret Softwares and Hacking Tools Don\'t Show Again Invalid Setup File Looks like you messed up the installation. Either Install it from playstore or follow the link Local Upgrade Playstore Upgrade Continue Anyway Report This Website If you think url is illegal or disturbing report us so that we can update our database\n Report Dismiss Initializing Please wait! While we connect you to hidden web. This might take few minutes\n Dismiss Try Again Data Cleared Genesis data has been cleared. Please try to start application from Homepage\n Dismiss Update Pending You have not updated this app for a while please update it to get best performance\n Update URL Reported Successfully URL has been successfully reported. It will take about a week to completely remove this website from our servers\n Dismiss Action not Supported No application found to handle email Dismiss Rate US We don\'t take donations or earn money from this app. We are trying to make a private anonymous internet \n\nIf you think this app works please rate us it gives us hope and strength to continue Like This App Don\'t Like This App Sorry To Hear That! If you are having any trouble and want to contact us please email us at gamesolstudios@gmail.com We will try to solve your problem as soon as possible Send Mail Bookmark Dismiss Clear site storage? This will clear data for all sites Clear Dismiss Clear open tabs? This will clear all stored tabs Clear Clear site bookmark? This will clear data for all saved sites\n Clear Dismiss Download Notification Download File | Download Request New Bridge You can get a bridge address through email, the web or by scanning a bridge QR code. Select \'Email\' below to request a bridge address.\n\nOnce you have an address, copy & paste it into the above box and start. EMAIL URL Notification
